about_the_game:
Shut the Box is a classic game of strategy, luck, and creative thinking. With roots tracing back to pub games of old, this board game with dice has been reimagined in a sleek digital format, perfect for both casual gamers and those who enjoy a challenge.How to Play: The goal is to turn down as many tiles as you can by rolling dice and using the numbers you roll to match the tiles. At the start, all the tiles are standing. The game ends when a player reaches 45 points. The player with the fewest points at the end wins.
 
Can you shut all the tiles before running out of options? Whether you're aiming for a quick game or mastering high scores, every roll tests your decision-making and luck.
 

Features:

  • Championship: Test yourself in 20 stages across 4 leagues and climb the global top.

  • Quick Play: Challenge yourself to beat the advanced AI.

  • Hotseat mode: Go head-to-head with friends.

  • Relaxing music & visuals: Enjoy a stress-free gaming session with calming sounds and a clean, intuitive interface.

  

Whether you're a seasoned Shut the Box player or trying it for the first time, this game offers the perfect blend of simplicity and depth. Roll the dice, shut the box, and see how far your strategy will take you!
